title: Lowest Bribery Incidence
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Lithuania reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, indicating a very low level of bribery in the business environment.

title: All Firms Formally Registered
description: As of 2019, 100% of firms in Lithuania were formally registered when they started operations, showcasing a highly regulated and formal business sector.

title: High Statistical Performance
description: Lithuania achieved a score of 94.31 in the Statistical Performance Indicators for Pillar 3 data products in 2023, reflecting strong capabilities in statistical data production.

title: Low Number of Out-of-School Boys
description: In 2021, only 17 male children of primary school age were out of school in Lithuania, representing just 0.03% of the male primary school age population.
